about_the_game:
Corduroy Hollow® is a first-person survival horror game. Play as Ashley as she explores the depths of a creepy decrepit house in the middle of the woods. Combat possessed children's toys, solve puzzles, and evade the ever-lurking Corduroy demon, while seeking your way out. You never know who or what is going to be around the next corner in this dilapidated house of shadows and corduroy.

  • First-person survival horror
  • Wander the old decrepit house in the woods using agility, stealth and strategy to avoid the possessed children's toys
  • Earn powerful new abilities to help you in your escape.
  • Solve environmental puzzles, ally with friendly stuffed animal characters, and elude the horror of the Corduroy Demon
  • Discover the terrifying secrets of the creepy, desecrated grounds of Corduroy Hollow®

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

detailed_description:

About the Game

Corduroy Hollow® is a first-person survival horror game. Play as Ashley as she explores the depths of a creepy decrepit house in the middle of the woods. Combat possessed children's toys, solve puzzles, and evade the ever-lurking Corduroy demon, while seeking your way out. You never know who or what is going to be around the next corner in this dilapidated house of shadows and corduroy.

  • First-person survival horror
  • Wander the old decrepit house in the woods using agility, stealth and strategy to avoid the possessed children's toys
  • Earn powerful new abilities to help you in your escape.
  • Solve environmental puzzles, ally with friendly stuffed animal characters, and elude the horror of the Corduroy Demon
  • Discover the terrifying secrets of the creepy, desecrated grounds of Corduroy Hollow®
name: Corduroy Hollow

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD processor, 2 GHz or faster.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970

short_description: Corduroy Hollow® is a first-person survival horror game set in a decrepit house in the middle of the woods tainted by evil and the occult. Discover the truth. Escape the mansion. Above all, fear the Corduroy Demon…and survive.
